Q: Based on the projections provided in the previous earnings call, can we ensure that Q2 cash in hand will be sustainable for the Q3 payments and operations sector? how can we be sure based on previous data? View More

A: I feel the best way to look at this senario, is that the cash in hand at the end of Q2 should in theory be able to support Q3 payments and operations unless an anomaly were to cause strain to the current Q2 cash flow View More
